snippet.title: Achtung Banditen?! [VR] - Trailer
snippet.description:
Immersive VR installation for Smartphone, Tablet and PC, in memory of the victims based on the Atlas of Nazi and Fascist Massacres in Italy.

Launch the project: https://redmagicblue.itch.io/achtung-banditen

Artists: ARTOLDO - Sara Ferro & Chris Weil

Developer: RedMagicBlue
